example_translations.source: Because this is one of the young of the species.
example_translations.reference: Kwa sababu huyu ni mmoja wa vijana wa spishi hiyo.

example_translations.source: Mchezaji wa kuteleza kwenye theluji anachukua njia ya mteremko chini ya mlima.
example_translations.reference: Skier takes a steep path down the mountain.

example_translations.source: Mwanamume aliyevalia suruali fupi nyeusi amesimama mbele ya mlima uliofunikwa na theluji.
example_translations.reference: A man wearing black shorts is standing in front of a snow covered mountain.
yeah well i was cooking me a grilled cheese
